content.prompt: In these works, both sculptors were preoccupied primarily with which of the following challenges?

choices.label: New ways to deal with the concept of motion
Radically new ways of portraying the nude

topic.text: 4.1: Interactions Within and Across Cultures in Later European and American Art

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Describe visual elements of a work of art (or group of related works of art) beyond the image set, including-  a. form.  b.  Style.  c. materials.  d. technique.  e. content.
